name: ShadowSide
description: ShadowSide is a First Person Exploration game. A policeman Alex Carter has been watching over the tranquility in the town for many years. He protects the people from robbery and crime. Nothing but a routine.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX 4300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 460 2 Gb/Radeon 6850 2 Gb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Steam must be online
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 3.6 GHz/AMD FX-9590 4.7 GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 3GB/AMD Radeon R9 290X 4GB or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Steam must be online
